text: pāpayan karamin siṭina ovungen kenekuṭa maraṇaya ḷan̆gā vū viṭa, “menna! mā (magē pāpayanṭa) pascātāpa vannemi” yayi pavasannēda ohuṭada, kavurun (viśvāsaya notabā pratikṣēpa kara) pratikṣēpaya matama siṭinnōda ovunṭada, pav kṣamāvak næta! mevænnanṭa vēdanā gena dena dan̆ḍuvamama piḷiyela kara ættemu
